LinkedIn Description:
I am an aquaculture and fisheries professional with expertise in fish biotechnology, aquaculture, molecular biology, and bioinformatics. I hold an MFSc from ICAR-Central Institute of Fisheries Education (CIFE), Mumbai, where my research focused on transcriptome analysis of fish species under environmental stress, with a particular emphasis on identifying growth-related gene expression.

With hands-on experience in DNA/RNA isolation, plasmid isolation, Real-Time PCR, ELISA, Western Blotting, cryopreservation techniques, fish breeding, marking & tagging, and bioinformatics, I am passionate about applying these skills to fisheries, plant, and animal sectors.

Currently, I serve as a Technical Manager at Valvin Aqua Pvt. Ltd., where I:
✔ Manage laboratory activities to support aquaculture farmers.
✔ Conduct research on new product development and implement IoT-based field trials in fisheries.
✔ Engage in scientific writing, prepare technical brochures, and oversee social media outreach for aquaculture awareness.
✔ Provide technical support and prescriptions to optimize shrimp and fish culture practices.

Additionally, I work in close collaboration with Deepak Nexgen Biotech Private Limited, contributing to advancements in biotechnology solutions for aquaculture and fisheries.

I am committed to advancing sustainable aquaculture through research, innovation, and farmer-centric solutions. Let’s connect to explore opportunities in aquaculture technology, biotechnology, and fisheries research!
Skills: Data Collection, Critical Thinking, Microsoft Excel, Research Skills, Computer Simulations, Research Implementation, Presentations, ELISA, Research Methods, Databases, Literature Reviews, Communication, Biology, Molecular Biology, Molecular Cloning, Molecular & Cellular Biology, Molecular Microbiology, Molecular Diagnostics, Transcriptomics, Metagenomics, data science with R, data science with python, Leadership, Microsoft Office, Customer Service, Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint, Social Media, Public Speaking, Online Advertising, Financial Analysis, Business Analysis

LinkedIn Description:
==========    Experienced Data Science Manager with deep expertise in     ==========
•  Creating Explainable AI solutions
•  Linear/Non-linear regression & classification modelling techniques
•  Feature engineering and feature extraction for model building
•  Signal processing to reduce noise from features
•  Feature selection for optimization using filter method, wrapper method and metaheuristic algorithms
•  Ensemble learning to achieve a high level of model performance
•  Clustering using different similarity metrics as well as techniques
•  Mentoring data scientists

==========    Sneak peek of some solutions I have developed are    ==============
•  Aspect-level sentiment analysis
•  Text classification using transfer learning from LLM's such as BERT and RoBERTa
•  Demand forecasting using past historical data (ARIMA, ARIMAX, Randomforest)
•  Spatial regression modelling using geo-coordinates as well as other features
•  Prediction of machine failure using a combination of signal processing, machine learning, and Metaheuristic techniques

==========    Contributions for data science and Python community    ============
•  Author of a Book and Research paper in machine learning
•  Authored 5 open source Python libraries TextFeatureSelection, SNgramExtractor, BaselineRemoval, MetaheuristicsFS and Pandas2Shp
•  These libraries are used in ML, NLP, signal processing and geospatial data respectively

>>> A typical project I work on starts with
•  Interacting with functional specialists to understand business problem.
•  Converting business problems into data science problems
•  Navigating through messy raw data to develop solutions
•  Balancing the practicality of business problems, with algorithmic sophistication and explainability
•  Finally, deploying the model as an API or on SageMaker

>>> Modelling Toolkit: Deep Learning, Linear, Tree-based regression and classification. Techniques including, but not limited to:
•  Linear and Logistic regression

LinkedIn Description:
Highly motivated professional specializing in Urban Management Governance with a strong background in Material Science and Engineering.

I recently completed a rewarding internship at CRUT, where I actively contributed to urban development projects and gained valuable hands-on experience in implementing sustainable policies. Having completed my MBA, I successfully finished an integrated MTech program in Material Science and Engineering from CIPET, where I acquired a deep understanding of advanced materials and their applications.

During my academic journey, I had the privilege of interning at esteemed organizations like Tata Steel, IMMT-CSIR, and IMFA. These experiences provided me with valuable insights into industry practices and further fueled my passion for research and development. Following my internships, I served as a dedicated researcher at IMMT-CSIR for a year, from 2020 to 2021. In this role, I actively contributed to cutting-edge projects in material science, making significant contributions to the field.

My unique blend of expertise in material science and urban management governance enables me to approach challenges from a multidisciplinary perspective. I am driven by a strong desire to leverage my skills and knowledge to drive sustainable urban development and find innovative solutions for complex issues. Now, having completed my MBA, I am eager to explore new opportunities that align with my passion for creating a positive impact in both the scientific and urban development domains.
